StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:1} refugees have fled into our borders and requested asylum. They claim they have been the victims of economic oppression that made them little more than slaves.[BR][BR]The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have demanded their return. They make no comment about the refugees' claims, only stating that it is none of our concern.

StringTable.Label: Event_Refugees_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain a Colony Ship[BR]-3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Dec
StringTable.String: We are exiling Mors Ven from our empire. We believe he is a black market trader and information dealer. However, we are unable to prove it and he is well-liked by our citizens.[BR][BR]If something happened to his shuttle while it was within your borders, that would be a fortunate accident.

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can make sure that happens.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExileLiberty_String1
StringTable.String: You took care of Mors Ven

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can make the accident happen, for a fee.

StringTable.Label: Event_Exile_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We need talented men, recruit Mors Ven.

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: Pirates, smugglers and worse plague this sector.[BR][BR]We are making a concerted effort to rid ourselves of these vermin, but our efforts are limited if they can simply escape into your borders.[BR][BR]We need your efforts as well, for both of our interests.

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrime_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will allocate resources to stopping them.

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrimeLiberty_String1
StringTable.String: You joined us against the Pirates

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrime_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will allocate resources to stopping them. (lie)

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrimeEquality_String1
StringTable.String: You joined us against the Pirates

StringTable.Label: Event_BorderworldCrimeAuthority_String1
StringTable.String: You didn't join against the pirates

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClash_Dec
StringTable.String: Our citizens have become enamored of your trinkets and entertainment, leading to a new generation being born on our worlds with your ridiculous names.[BR][BR]A few temporary restrictions will help bring order, and won't have significant impact on your long-term efforts.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClash_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will accept limited restrictions for our common good.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClash_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We plan on giving your citizens more of what they want.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureClashAuthority_String1
StringTable.String: You are waging cultural war on us.

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered an illegal cloning experiment on {PLANETNAME} that will, in short order, greatly increase our population.[BR][BR]However, the DNA was taken from citizens without their permission.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Return the DNA to its owners and let them decide.

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Promote the scientist behind these experiments.

StringTable.Label: Event_IllegalCloning_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: These clones have no rights. Hatch them immediately.

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Dec
StringTable.String: We have captured the famed mercenary Mirazu Ysen. Our people cry for justice in response to his history of theft and banditry. But he might be better put to another use.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Imprison the mercenary, he will pay for his crimes.

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Rebuild his ship if he agrees to join you.

StringTable.Label: Event_Ysengard_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We could use someone like him in our government.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Dec
StringTable.String: We have uncovered a Precursor probe orbiting {PLANETNAME}. We are not sure why it was sent here or how long it has been here, but the technology is advanced.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's study this and see what we can learn.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Repair the Probe and see what it does.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorProbe_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Sell the Probe to the highest bidder.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: We have come across an ancient artifact near {PLANETNAME}, believed to have come from an ancient Precursor civilization. Upon activating it, it has evaluated our status and offered to aid us.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorArtifact_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlock the Nail ship in your shipyard

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorArtifact_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convert it into an army of synthetic citizens.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Dec
StringTable.String: During an interview, you are asked what you feel your citizens need to succeed in a time when we are exploring the galaxy and encountering alien species.[BR][BR]What would you like to promote?

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Deception_Dec
StringTable.String: This will make additional event choices available later.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Persuassion_Dec
StringTable.String: This will improve our persuassion technique during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Intimidation_Dec
StringTable.String: This will let us get more when we use our intimidation technique during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Dec
StringTable.String: We have come across an ancient terraforming device near {PLANETNAME}. Upon activating, it tells us that there was once a great war between the crafters and a powerful enemy. This device was left to help protect future civilizations from predation in the event they lost.[BR][BR]It offers us three options.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to improve the world's biomes.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to produce raw minerals in the planet's crust.

StringTable.Label: Event_AbandonedDevice_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to fabricate rare resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorRelic_Dec
StringTable.String: Near {PLANETNAME} we have discovered an ancient recording device that appears to have been drifting for centuries. The technology is delicate, but incredibly advanced.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorRelic_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's use its recordings to make our world a center of influence.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrecursorRelic_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use it to help us increase our planet's development.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Dec
StringTable.String: We discovered a hidden outpost occupied by a single alien. He claims that he was sent to observe us, and that he has peaceful intentions.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convert the outpost to a colony.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invite the alien to join our government.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousOutpost_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Force the alien to tell us everything he knows.

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people would like to send a beacon out into the universe, a message to the other starfaring races we will one day meet.[BR][BR]What would you like this message to be?

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send a message of peace and hope.

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It is a waste of time. Put the resources toward more practical measures.

StringTable.Label: Event_Message_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send a message telling them to prepare for their eventual enslavement.

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Dec
StringTable.String: A blight has affected {PLANETNAME}. Your administrators warn that there won't be enough food for all of your citizens. The wealthy have already begun stockpiling food, and the desperate have begun raiding those stockpiles.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Share with the less fortunate. We will suffer together.

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Distribute the goods to our leaders. We will need their strength to survive.

StringTable.Label: Event_Famine_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Stage a war among our people. Let them turn on each other.

StringTable.Label: Event_FamineSuccess_Dec
StringTable.String: Just as you hoped, the citizens on {PLANETNAME} have turned on each other. None of them blame you for the famine.

StringTable.Label: Event_FamineFail_Dec
StringTable.String: You plan backfires and your citizens blame you for the famine.

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation has been born on {PLANETNAME}, the first that are likely to live and die on distant worlds.[BR][BR]How should we best prepare them for their future?

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our military always needs new recruits.

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our most brilliant thinkers will lead us forward.

StringTable.Label: Event_NewGeneration_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow them to pursue their dreams, we need more artists.

StringTable.Label: Event_Legacy_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered the remnants of one of our first space vessels. Evidence of a time when we stepped nervously beyond {PLANETNAME}.[BR][BR]What should we do with this piece of history?

StringTable.Label: Event_Legacy_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Put it in a museum so it may inspire future generations.

StringTable.Label: Event_Legacy_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: There is no value in nostalgia, scrap it for parts.

StringTable.Label: Event_Cult_Dec
StringTable.String: A new cult has begun to grow in number on {PLANETNAME}. The cult has grown wealthy by convincing rich members to make substantial donations.[BR][BR]The followers believe that we were given life by an alien species, and they predict that these creators will soon return to lead us.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Cult_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They offer a unique insight, invite their leader to join us.

StringTable.Label: Event_Cult_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unique voices should be protected, not constrained.

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Dec
StringTable.String: A group has begun to protest the resources that are being spent exploring the galaxy. They argue that those resources are better spent improving the lives of those on {PLANETNAME}.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow them to present their opinions before the budget committee.

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They can protest, but arrest anyone who goes beyond that.

StringTable.Label: Event_Protest_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: If they want to improve the planet, put them to work doing exactly that.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Dec
StringTable.String: A biographer is interviewing you so that he can write a book about your rise to power. He asks what motivated you to lead the drive from your homeworld and into the unknown reaches of space.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have achieved greatness, and now it is our responsibility to share that with the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have only seen a tiny fraction of what the universe offers. So much more awaits.

StringTable.Label: Event_Biographer_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I am seeking new worlds to conquer.

StringTable.Label: Event_Museum_Dec
StringTable.String: A museum is opening a display about your life. They would like to know what you feel your greatest accomplishment has been.

StringTable.Label: Event_Museum_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I alone have done nothing. Together, we have done everything.

StringTable.Label: Event_Museum_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: My greatest accomplishment is yet to come.

StringTable.Label: Event_DigDeep_Dec
StringTable.String: Economic advisors on {PLANETNAME} discovered rare resources under the planet's most fertile region. They want permission to excavate the land to reach these resources.[BR][BR]They promise to set up a small exhibit for all the species they exterminate.

StringTable.Label: Event_DigDeep_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invest in improving the fertile region instead.

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Dec
StringTable.String: An attempt to create an improved antibiotic has instead produced a bacteria that is immune to our treatments. It has escaped the lab and your scientists warn that it is spreading on {PLANETNAME}.[BR][BR]It can be fatal to infants and the elderly.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Quarantine the sick, by force if need be.

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Prioritize health care and make sure the infected get treatment.

StringTable.Label: Event_Disease_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Warn the citizens and allow them to respond as they want.

StringTable.Label: Event_RequestForSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a growing dislike for the {PLAYERFACTION:1} among our people. The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have requested that we attempt to curb this disapproval by releasing a public statement supporting them.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_RequestForSupport_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will issue a statement of support

StringTable.Label: Event_RequestForSupport_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Condemn the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for attempting to influence your people.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Dec
StringTable.String: A ship of unknown origin has appeared on our borders. It has weaponry so advanced our scanners are unable to classify it. We receive one message from it: pay up or those weapons will be turned against us.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will not bend to threats.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Paying him off is the most reasonable option.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheSabre_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Offer to build him an even better ship if he joins us.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pirates_Dec
StringTable.String: Reports are coming in from multiple sources of increased pirate activity. Our people demand that we do something to keep our worlds safe.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Event_Pirates_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Recruit a military advisor to counter the threat.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pirates_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Warn our citizens of the threat, they may help.

StringTable.Label: Event_RecruitmentDrive_Dec
StringTable.String: A rush of excitement in our space program has spurred a lot of new candidates applying for critical positions. We should take advantage of this situation while it lasts.

StringTable.Label: Event_RecruitmentDrive_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should take advantage of this

StringTable.Label: Event_ElectionWarning_Dec
StringTable.String: An election to reform our government will happen in five weeks. It will be based on the [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] of our citizens.[BR][BR]Anything we can do to improve our citizen's Approval will help our reform pass. Or we could simply adjust the results to ensure the measure passes.[BR][BR]What would you like to do?

StringTable.Label: Event_ElectionWarning_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will let the results speak for themselves.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Dec
StringTable.String: A covert message is sent to all telepaths in the empire, they are to begin an exhausting and costly ritual to amplify their power. As they concentrate, their minds begin to merge, forming a collective consciousness that reaches out across the vast expanse of space. They search for any sentient beings on {PLANETNAME} and begin to probe their mind. Their psychic connection remains steadfast, enabling them to subtly implant thoughts and manipulate their targets without detection, at least for the present.[BR]What should we make the citizens of {PLANETNAME} believe?

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convince them they are on fire.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Liberty_Victim_Name
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} slips into chaos as citizen after citizen falls into an uncontrollable panic. They scream about burning alive and beg those around to extinguish the flames; however, none falling to this mass delusion are on fire. Only a slim handful are broken of their illusion after intense counseling. Secretly officials are beginning to suspect a sort of mind-control attack. Those managing the crisis report it'll take five months for the society of {PLANETNAME} to fully recover.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them believe that every conversation is argument to be won.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Mod_Equality_Victim_Name
StringTable.String: The crisis on {PLANETNAME} begins with a few arguments. Quickly all tempers are boiling over. Screaming matches are inescapable, their pervasiveness impacting everyone across {PLANETNAME}. Experts in conflict resolution are rushed in to aid. The work is slow at first as none of the arguments have any substance. Sealed reports indicate the source of the episode to be a telepathic attack. Without genuine grievances, it takes a lot of time to end fights. Sources indicate it will take ten months to resolve the crisis on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them hear an annoying beep they cannot find the source of.

StringTable.Label: Event_Pandemonium_Mod_Authority_Victim_Name
StringTable.String: The citizens of {PLANETNAME} report an incessant beeping en masse. The disturbance seems to have developed overnight. Medical experts on the colony (themselves suffering the annoyance) are confounded. Experts are transported to {PLANETNAME}, but all their studies are inconclusive. The only explanation that makes sense is a psychological attack through telepathy. Based on the reported rate of decay of the sound, it will take 15 months for the crisis to resolve itself on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Dec
StringTable.String: A covert message is sent to all telepaths in the empire, they are to begin an exhausting and costly ritual to amplify their power. As they concentrate, their minds begin to merge, forming a collective consciousness that reaches out across the vast expanse of space.[BR]They search for any sentient beings on {PLANETNAME} and begin to probe their mind. Their psychic connection remains steadfast, enabling them to subtly implant thoughts and manipulate their targets without detection, at least for the present.[BR]What should we make the citizens of {PLANETNAME} believe?

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them fall in love at first sight.

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make them believe that every meal is the best they ever had.

StringTable.Label: Event_Serenity_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convince them to celebrate every single achievement. No matter how small.

StringTable.Label: Event_Gov1Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has passed to reform the government to an Imperial government by a popular vote of {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}%![BR][BR]Imperial governments are more efficient and boost our [HS=HS_PolicySlot]Policy Slots[/HS] and [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS], as well as expanding our [HS=HS_ShipRange]Ship Range[/HS] considerably.[BR][BR]But, as our government advances, so will the [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS] of our citizens. We must keep them happy if we are to be successful in future elections.

StringTable.Label: Event_Gov2Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has passed to reform the government to a Republic government by a popular vote of {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}%![BR][BR]Republic governments are more efficient and boost our [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] and [HS=HS_Logistics]Logistics[/HS] substantially.[BR][BR]But, as our government advances, so will the [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS] of our citizens. We must keep them happy if we are to be successful in future elections.

StringTable.Label: Event_Gov3Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has passed to reform the government to a Federation by a popular vote of {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}%![BR][BR]Federations are the envy of other civilizations and boost our [HS=HS_influence]Influence[/HS] considerably.[BR][BR]But, as our government advances, so will the [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS] of our citizens. We must keep them happy if we are to be successful in future elections.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernmentUpgradeFail_Dec
StringTable.String: The election has voted against reforming the government to {WANTEDGOVERNMENTNAME:1}. Those in favor only made up {LASTELECTIONVOTES:1}% of the vote.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisloyalGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, is displeased with our interference and is threatening to join the {FOREIGNINFLUENCER}.[BR][BR]They claim we interfere with their world, and there should be more freedom to govern themselves.[BR][BR]Our advisors claim that doing so will increase [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_DisloyalGovernorLiberty_String2
StringTable.String: You allow me to govern as I want

StringTable.Label: Event_DisloyalGovernor_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Bribe the Governor to change his mind.

StringTable.Label: Event_ToxicGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, is speaking openly about our incompetence. Our other leaders have already begun to take notice, and it is souring their opinion of us.[BR][BR]Some of our more soft-hearted advisors suggest that this is a normal part of a complex society, while others recommend that we take firm action against the governor and the soft-hearted advisors.

StringTable.Label: Event_ToxicGovernor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow him to speak his mind.

StringTable.Label: Event_ToxicGovernor_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Some time in a dungeon should fix this.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorScandal_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, is widely believed to be favoring personal friends at the expense of their world's citizens.[BR][BR]Our advisors have investigated the accusations and determined that they are false, and {GOVERNORNAME} hasn't done anything wrong.[BR][BR]Still, there is a loud public outcry for us to at least chastise the governor in some manner, or we will seem to be complicit in the supposed corruption.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorScandal_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The governor has done nothing wrong and we will support them.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorScandal_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Condemn the governor. That's the price of politics.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, warns that their planet is under cultural assault by the {FOREIGNINFLUENCER}.[BR][BR]{FOREIGNINFLUENCER} influence has begun to show up in local media, games and fashion, especially among younger citizens.[BR][BR]{GOVERNORNAME} is requesting a grant to counter this threat.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will fund a cultural celebration on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Impose an import tax on foreign goods.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestInfluence_Harmony_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is their problem to deal with.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, has done a poor job of setting up a justice system on their planet.[BR][BR]Instead of dealing with it locally, they are requesting our capital's lawmakers deal with the problem.[BR][BR]It is disappointing that such measures are needed to deal with one governor's incompetence, but we have little choice if we don't want [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] to grow on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestCrime_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is their problem to deal with.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestCrime_Harmony_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Investigate signs of crime and corruption, starting with the inept governor.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestPollution_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, governor of {PLANETNAME}, is warning of a potential climate disaster on their planet. Deep fissures have begun to release immense amounts of heat and particles into the atmosphere.[BR][BR]Without immediate action it could cause damage to {PLANETNAME}. But it would require significant resources to address.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestPollution_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Redirect local manufacturing to resolve the issue.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorRequestPollution_Harmony_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is their problem to deal with.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who have wronged {GOVERNORNAME} often encounter significant bad luck, some going missing entirely. At first these were just rumors, but those rumors have created fear.[BR][BR]When questioned about it, {GOVERNORNAME} quietly denies any involvement, only offering that bad things happen to bad people.[BR][BR]The only piece of evidence is {GOVERNORNAME}'s notebook, where many of those who ran into misfortune are listed and crossed off.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It would be foolish to cross {GOVERNORNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Assign security to those on {GOVERNORNAME}'s list and monitor them closely.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheList_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Your name has been added to {GOVERNORNAME}'s list.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Dec
StringTable.String: A relic which has deep symbolic meaning among our people has been missing for decades.[BR][BR]It was recently discovered to be held by one of your leaders, {GOVERNORNAME}.[BR][BR]How they acquired it is irrelevant. We have already asked them to return it and offered to purchase it from them. They have refused.[BR][BR]We are counting on you to do the right thing and hand it over to us.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} has made their choice, and I stand behind it.

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBroochLiberty_String2
StringTable.String: You refused to return our relic

StringTable.Label: Event_MysteriousBrooch_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will make sure the brooch is turned over to you.

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} has incurred a significant debt for the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Your name was used as collateral, and it's certainly an insignificant sum to you.[BR][BR]I trust you will pay this debt and keep {GOVERNORNAME} out of harm's way.

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We cannot afford it. Do as you must to {GOVERNORNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblemsLiberty_String2
StringTable.String: You don't pay yo ur debts

StringTable.Label: Event_GamblingProblems_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: No. And any aggression towards {GOVERNORNAME} will be met with war.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriage_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}'s family has a long tradition of arranged marriages, though they themselves are opposed to it, and have previously fled from the marriage their family set up.[BR][BR]However, now a new suitor has been selected, and while the family isn't asking for you to force {GOVERNORNAME} to do anything, they do wish for you to intercede on their behalf, talking to {GOVERNORNAME} about being open to the idea.[BR][BR]The family offers a small token if you accept this request.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriage_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I won't have any part of this.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageLiberty_String1
StringTable.String: You didn't meddle in my life

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriage_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will speak to {GOVERNORNAME} about it.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageSuccess_Dec
StringTable.String: The family is furious that you would disrupt their plans for an arranged marriage. To their shock, {GOVERNORNAME} accepts your proposal.[BR][BR]The story of your marriage warms the hearts of your people, and even other civilizations send gifts and best wishes.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageFail_Dec
StringTable.String: The family is furious that you would disrupt their plans for an arranged marriage. But it is nothing compared to {GOVERNORNAME}'s shock and disappointment.[BR][BR]The rejection is immediate, and a little hurtful.

StringTable.Label: Event_ArrangedMarriageFail_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Things are going to be awkward for a while.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Dec
StringTable.String: Rumors are spreading on {PLANETNAME} of a strange cult. There are numerous reports of people disappearing from hospitals, and evidence points to involvement by the planet's governor, {GOVERNORNAME}.[BR][BR]Interrogating {GOVERNORNAME} uncovers the truth. A device was being used to cure the sick, at the cost of damage to {GOVERNORNAME}'s body. Painful scars are left by the device that impair movement and control.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: You cannot sacrifice the world's governor for the least of its citizens. Take the device.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This sacrifice is noble, but minimize it to keep {GOVERNORNAME} safe.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scars_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Use the device to transfer the scars from {GOVERNORNAME} to you.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} makes frequent requests of the government. Better housing, improved public education, free health care, and on and on.[BR][BR]Today it is about clean water. This is not an issue for most of our citizens but {GOVERNORNAME} argues that millions of our most vulnerable lack access to safe water.[BR][BR]Your advisors are tired of listening to the complaining and argue that the process will be both expensive and provide little tangible value to our civilization.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Fine. Increase regulations on our planets to make sure the water is safe everywhere.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We don't have time for these trivial requests.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion2_Dec
StringTable.String: It isn't unusual to get incessant requests from {GOVERNORNAME}, but this one is extreme.[BR][BR]{GOVERNORNAME} argues that {PLAYERFACTION:1} citizens are suffering and receiving inadequate resources and medical attention.[BR][BR]Your advisors are stunned by the suggestion that we would dedicate some of our rare resources to another civilization, and beg you to stop {GOVERNORNAME}'s madness.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion2_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Fine. Provide resources to {PLAYERFACTION:1} to prevent their suffering.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion2_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We don't have time for these trivial requests.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion3_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}'s advocacy for the least of our citizens is well known. As is our support for these requests.[BR][BR]Though the aide received little direct benefit, our citizens have not forgotten our kindness and throw a celebration in {GOVERNORNAME}'s honor.[BR][BR]Some of them even remember our role in providing this help.

StringTable.Label: Event_Compassion3_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We are judged by how we treat the least of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Event_RenegadeGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, has discovered a cache of Precursor technology. Unfortunately, rather than share it, they have used it to negotiate a high ranking position in the {FOREIGNINFLUENCER}.[BR][BR]Because of his act of treason, we have lost {PLANETNAME} and this hidden cache.

StringTable.Label: Event_RenegadeGovernor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Their treason won't be quickly forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Event_LoyalGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, is so enamored with your leadership that a statue of you has been erected on their world.[BR][BR]Though the statue provides little practical benefit, the governor's devotion could be a very useful commodity.

StringTable.Label: Event_LoyalGovernor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will make use of this.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorFundRaiser_Dec
StringTable.String: Your fame on {PLANETNAME} has caused the governor, {GOVERNORNAME}, to hold a massive fundraiser in your honor.[BR][BR]The event was a success and greatly contributed to our public coffers.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorFundRaiser_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will make use of this.

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME} has been falsely accusing the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for all the issues on their world. From crime to disease their rhetoric has begun to galvanize the anger on the world in a way that may be beneficial in the short term, but dangerous in diplomatic relations.[BR][BR]It has now come to a crossroads where the {PLAYERFACTION:1} expects you to denounce the hate speech, but this is likely to turn the anger against us.

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Support the Governor. We can use this opportunity.

StringTable.Label: Event_HateSpeech_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Denounce the Governor, such rhetoric is dangerous.

StringTable.Label: Event_CallForWar_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME} is claiming that we have grown soft by a long period without war. They claim that our failure to move against weaker enemies undermines our future and ability to become a dominant power in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Event_CallForWar_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Have a military parade to appease the Governor.

StringTable.Label: Event_CallForWar_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Some time in a dungeon will show the Governor that we are not soft.

StringTable.Label: Event_CyberneticImplants_Dec
StringTable.String: Year ago {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME} suffered an accident and was saved by the use of cybernetic implants. Though few object to using the technology to save lives {GOVERNORNAME} found a precursor artifact they are planning to tie into their cybernetics and could potentially provide nearly perfect memory and reduce the need for sleep to a few minutes a day.

StringTable.Label: Event_CyberneticImplants_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the procedure, this future is unavoidable.

StringTable.Label: Event_CyberneticImplants_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Outlaw the procedure and take the precursor resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_Eureka_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} is unquestioningly brilliant, but is so obsessed with their research that they have failed to adequately manage {PLANETNAME}. Our advisors are requesting that we force them to focus on their world, but {GOVERNORNAME} claims to be close to a breakthrough.

StringTable.Label: Event_Eureka_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow them to pursue their studies.

StringTable.Label: Event_Eureka_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Force them to focus on their job.

StringTable.Label: Event_Greed_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} the governor of {PLANETNAME} is the richest citizen on their planet. Having exploited so much wealth from their world they are now eyeing our coffers. Our advisors warn against feeding their greed, but it is a small price to pay for their loyalty.

StringTable.Label: Event_Greed_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Provide the modest gift they are requesting.

StringTable.Label: Event_Greed_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Their wealth is better used in our coffers.

StringTable.Label: Event_Scandal_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} the governor of {PLANETNAME} is renown for their integrity and ethics. But an illicit romance has been discovered in their personal life, and {GOVERNORNAME} has sent a message to us letting us know that they plan to publicly accept responsibility for it, no matter the consequences.[BR][BR]Our advisors warn that the criminal extorting {GOVERNORNAME} will never be believed and has no real proof and suggest {GOVERNORNAME} deny the affair instead.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFire_Dec
StringTable.String: A fire spread through the slums of {PLANETNAME} and hundreds of our citizens were killed. An investigation confirms that safety guidelines were skipped while building the housing. {GOVERNORNAME} claims that it was a tragedy, but the regulations would have made it to expensive and left millions without homes. As evidence of the money saved they are willing to make a contribution to our governmental coffers.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFire_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Thank the governor for the contribution and look the other way.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFire_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Insist that all housing be brought up to standards.

StringTable.Label: Event_SlumFireEquality_String2
StringTable.String: You forced your polices on me.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheDinnerParty_Dec
StringTable.String: A lavish diplomatic dinner was held on {PLANETNAME}. What should have been a minor event has become a diplomatic incident because of the rude behavior of {GOVERNORNAME}. Many loud comments were made about the inferiority of other species that offended the {PLAYERFACTION:1} delegate.[BR][BR]Now, the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are demanding a public apology and threatening to ban all future diplomatic events if they don't get it.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheDinnerParty_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Apologize for our governor's inappropriate behavior.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarWeariness_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME}, the governor of {PLANETNAME}, has come forward to tell us that our years at war are having an effect on the citizens of their world. Depression is on the rise, especially among the young. They ask that we end our wars quickly and return to a period of peace and posterity.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarWeariness_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Launch a media campaign to communicate the virtues of the war.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarWeariness_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Do nothing. War is costly to everyone involved.

StringTable.Label: Event_TheMissionaries_Dec
StringTable.String: {GOVERNORNAME} has captured an illegal group of {PLAYERFACTION:1} citizens on {PLANETNAME}. They claim to be religious missionaries but had a small stockpile of weapons in their belongings which they say were for defense.[BR][BR]{GOVERNORNAME} has imprisoned them and has requested permission to begin interrogating them. {PLAYERFACTION:1} claims that they are innocent and demands that they be released immediately.

StringTable.Label: Event_BreakAwayColony_Dec_5XA
StringTable.String: Traitors within our own colonization program have been secretly planning against us for months. They found and kept secret a high quality world and took some of your most hated rivals and settled it.[BR][BR]They have no interest in relations with us but rather intend to actually bring down our government if they can. We have no choice but to go to war with them.

StringTable.Label: Event_BreakAwayColony_Choice_Dec
StringTable.String: There is now a nearby new civilization made up of our own people seeking our destruction.

StringTable.Label: Event_BreakAwayColony_LeaderDesc
StringTable.String: The ambitious and malevolent Count Kurzko seeks your personal destruction.

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfWaking_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nocturnal cycle continues as the Season of Waking begins. The Season of Waking is associated with natural light and bright days and relates to physical labor and social gatherings. Celebrations heralding the seasonal shift often involve extravagant dinners and raucous dances.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] are boosted for every colony during the Season of Waking. It's best to leverage the new focus to complete more complex constructions and raise new citizens during this time.

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfDreaming_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nocturnal cycle continues as the Season of Dreaming begins. During the Season of Dreaming, respect is held for the dimmer lights of life -encompassing everything from the moon and magma to lightbulbs and flares. The reserved season is marked with art shows, the start of the academic calendar, and personal growth.[BR][BR][HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] are boosted for every colony during the Season of Dreaming. It's best to leverage the new focus to expand borders, annex territory, and research more complex technologies.

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfWaking_Response_Dec
StringTable.String: Every Colony recieves a boost to [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Event_Moths_SeasonOfDreaming_Response_Dec
StringTable.String: Every Colony recieves a boost to [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Dec
StringTable.String: The residents of {PLANETNAME} have discovered local fauna that when used, increases their intelligence sharply.[BR][BR]However, it is also highly addictive and results in reckless behavior which leads to crime.[BR][BR]What do you think we should do about it?

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Outlawing the plant will result in making people very unhappy for awhile.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Encourage its use. We will deal with the crime later.

StringTable.Label: Event_UnexpectedFlora_0x41A_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research on this planet will benefit from this but we will also see a rise in crime.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Dec
StringTable.String: The inhabitants of {PLANETNAME} have come across a primitive sentient species. They possess incredible strength and are exceedingly trusting. How should we proceed?

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: So the planet came with slaves? Excellent.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Enslaving this species will lead to a significant increase in planetary output but at a moral cost.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Leave them in peace and learn from them.

StringTable.Label: Event_PrimitiveSpecies_0x41B_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: By respecting their sovereignty and peaceful nature, we improve our own societal values and approval.

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Name
StringTable.String: A world under Siege by Storms

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLANETNAME} is enshrouded in fierce tempests that light up its skies with electric brilliance.[BR][BR]Whirlwinds, charged with raw cosmic energy, disrupt both nature and the colony's daily life. Biodomes tremble, and distress signals pierce through the storm's roar.[BR][BR]The settlers urgently seek guidance. How shall we protect them from this unyielding planetary wrath?

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: This will protect the citizens from the ravages of the storms, but the infrastructure will come with increased planetary maintenance costs.

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: I really wish I could help. But I just don't want to.

StringTable.Label: Event_ViolentStorms_0x41B_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: While this will save on infrastructure costs, the people will be displeased by the continued destruction and danger.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialConflict_0x41C_Dec
StringTable.String: The planet {PLANETNAME} is ablaze. Not with the radiance of its sun, but with the fires of civil strife.[BR][BR]The colonists, torn apart by old feuds and new animosities, skirmish beneath alien skies.[BR][BR]The unsettled atmosphere grows thick with tension, while reports of skirmishes and civil unrest flood the communication channels.[BR][BR]Do we intervene to restore order, or let them murder each other until the problem solves itself?

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialConflict_0x41C_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Establishing order will certainly quell the turmoil, but the heavy hand of law might stifle the colony's spirit.

StringTable.Label: Event_ColonialConflict_0x41C_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Entrusting the colonists to find their own harmony could either lead to unity or deepen the rifts.
